"Dangerously Bad Breath":
"Hey, <%me>, check this out!
I discovered a new species in the Skyscape! It's a
kind of dragorii with a big crest-like thing on
its noggin! It flew overhead the whole time, waiting
for a chance to nail me with its breath weapon.
Even I'd have been history if I hadn't made the split-
second tactical decision to get the heck out of there!
Anyway, that brings me to you. You know the drill.
Good luck, friend!
*Target: Hostiles level 34 or higher"

"おい<%me>！
聞いてくれよ。オレさ、浮遊大陸で
新種発見しちゃったぜ！
でっけートサカつけた龍族なんだけどよ。
ずっと空飛んでて、隙あらばブレス吐いて
攻撃してきやがるんだよ。
とっさの判断で戦略的撤退しなかったら
さすがのオレも危ないところだったぜ！
というわけで、いつものアレ！頼むよ！
※Lv.34～のエネミーが対象"
